attributes.action: Against Stopping Foreign Wifes Of British Citizens Coming To  Reside The Uk
attributes.additional_details:
They Are Now Talking of Trying To Stop The Foreign  Wifes Of British Citizens From Coming  To Reside In The Uk (No Entry) This Must Be Stopped  As They Supposed To Support  The people Of This Country  And Not Decriminate The Right Freedom And Liberties To The Rights To Happiness  Of British Subjects As We Are Intitled To The Right To Love And Happiness Of Where Love is Found
Im Against This Big Time
Now Im Supporting 100% For A Change In The Law
Supporting British Citizens For The  Rights To  Apply For Visa,s  Regarding  What  There  Circumstances Are When They Apply As  We Are Intitled To The Right To Love And Happiness Of Where We Go  Or Finds It As  Not Hold Us In Bondage By Denieing Us This Rights In Now Asking For A Change In The Presents Visa System Where Decrimination Is Presents must be changed
